name: Trizeal [SDC]
description:
Trizeal (トライジール) is a Shooter video game published by Triangle Service released on April 7th, 2005 for the SEGA Dreamcast.
Shooting Love: Trizeal (シューティング ラブ。～ＴＲＩＺＥＡＬ～) is a Shoot 'Em Up video game published by Datam Polystar released on April 20th, 2006 for the PlayStation 2.
